title: NEAR Learning App
subtitle: Welcome
description: Welcome, thank you for your interest in learning to create fantastic applications in NEAR Protocol, and to help you understand the NEAR Protocol.

title: NEAR Learning App
subtitle: Enjoy it!
description: This app is designed for you, to learn at your own pace, and anytime! Let's get started with your own NEAR app.

title: NEAR Learning App
subtitle: Thank You
description: I hope that the app has a utility for you, and that you will enjoy using it. If you have any questions or comments, please leave a comment in the Store.
